channel.title: dbus on Home
channel.description: Recent content in dbus on Home

item.title: Play videoclip for currently playing song in mpv
item.description: Short demo: Your browser does not support the video tag. Requirements You’ll need: python 3.x mpv video player music player that supports MPRIS2 D-Bus interface mpd + mpDris2 deadbeef + mpris2-plugin some D-Bus packages -> dbus-devel dbus-python-devel dbus-glib-devel ddgr https://github.com/jarun/ddgr - a CLI client for DuckDuckGo System packages Once you have your player & MPRIS2 installed & configured, install: sudo dnf install dbus-devel dbus-python-devel dbus-glib-devel ddgr Python packages Next step is to install python packages.
